titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-09-24 - Part 1

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 24, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer - although Ernest Tubb was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performer Hawkshaw Hawkins, and regular performers Rod Brasfield with Uncle Cyp, Del Wood, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
